players.name: Bob
memory: Charlie: "I investigated Diana last night and she is Mafia. We must vote her out today to win."
Diana: "That is a lie. I am the detective and I investigated Charlie last night. He is Mafia."

You: "Bob is not mafia. I don't have any evidence to point at anyone else yet, but Charlie and Diana are contradicting each other about who they investigated last night, which makes me suspicious of both."
Charlie: "Diana is lying. I am the detective and my investigation confirms she is Mafia. Bob, trust me - vote Diana to win."
Diana: "Charlie is clearly lying to cover himself. I investigated him and he is Mafia. Bob, if you vote for me, the Mafia wins. Vote Charlie to secure town victory."
Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
